channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly-tipping of green waste, 9th September
item.description:
2 White Hackney Council bags of garden waste have been dumped outside of no. 27B. They have been here for the past 3 weeks. Resident requests they are removed ASAP.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Finsbury Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Crate, 9th September
item.description:
Crate dumped. Could either fall on someone or become an obstruction/ trip hazard if not removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Inigo Jones Road, Charlton, London

item.title: Card and polystyrene packaging fly-tipped outside 50 Ashburnham Grove., 9th September
item.description:
Card and polystyrene packaging was dumped outside 50 Ashburnham Grove on 8 September 2025. This was not done by the residents at no. 50.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Ashburnham Grove, London

item.title: Fly tipping right outside flats, 9th September
item.description:
It's been here for days. Household items and clothes dumped.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Somerford Grove Estate, Hackney, London

item.title: Garden wadte and rubble, 9th September
item.description:
House at 18 Exmouth road on corner of Budleigh crescent have again cut brambles that have dangerously hung over their fence in Budleigh crescent and stuffed the cuttings behind the green IT box on corner of Budleigh and exmouth. More bricks and stones are falling from their garden onto pavement. Rubble has never been cleared even though I reported it a few months back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Budleigh Crescent, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken street lamp, reference WC2S, 9th September
item.description:
The street lamp is damaged

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Woodberry Crescent, Muswell Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Door entry system not working, 9th September
item.description:
Main entrance door not allowing access via fob gallingale court 101-105 thames reach west thamesmead
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-8, Thames Reach, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside number 53, 9th September
item.description:
The house was underpinned due to subsidence years ago so I’d like to have someone check that this pavement collapse isn’t something serious. I am very concerned by the hole in front of the garden wall of 53 Constantine Road. It has been filled in twice but the indentation is obviously. It has recently not been infilled very satisfactorily. Could you please look at this hole again? Does someone need to be sent round to check it’s not due to movement underground? I also worry that it’s a bit of a trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Constantine Road, Gospel Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 8 bags of rubbish dumped outside 2 dorset square on pavemwnt, 9th September
item.description:
8 bags of rubbish dumped outside 2 dorset square on pavement need to clear out causing nuisance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 132, Gloucester Place, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cardbox with Flatscreen TV heavy dumped by drive, 9th September
item.description:
It was dropped overnight and I saw it this morning. The heavy box containing a flatscreen TV has had the delivery address scraped off.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter building up behind railings, 9th September
item.description:
Bottles and litter being dumped behind railings on Liverpool Grove. Area is part of St Peter's grounds.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Liverpool Grove, Walworth, London

item.title: Food waste all over path, 9th September
item.description:
Foxes have ripped open a household rubbish back that was fly tipped. Food waste and other rubbish all spread all over the door path

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflow of household waste, 9th September
item.description:
Other neighbours have been putting out their rubbish (after collecting it for some time apparently) and leaving outside other tenants properties, rather than their own.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Plumstead High Street, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 9th September
item.description:
Yet again, rubbish bags dumped and ripped into by foxes, rubbish spilling onto the pavement. Despite regular reporting, nothing long term appears to be done to resolve the issue, so another morning walking past litter with my child on the way to school. Grim, unhygienic, attracting vermin

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 128-136, Beckenham Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown garden causing damage to neighbouring property, 9th September
item.description:
Front garden of this council hous is overtaken by brambles. They're occasionally cut back, not eradicated, & have caused damage to the fence between numbers 87 and 85. Brambles also climb the walls of 85 & unless cut back by the occupiers will cause damage
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lordship Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more dumping on this corner, 9th September
item.description:
This is a constant location for dumping / fly tipping. Neighbours, my partner and myself are forced to make complaints on almost a daily basis. What will it take to convince you to at least put a SIGN UP in this location?!!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunsmure Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bags dumped, 9th September
item.description:
Bags containing raw meat spilled out onto the street. I know you’re turn around Is around 5 days but can these be removed as containing raw meat please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hylton Street, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Delivery can't turn, 9th September
item.description:
When delivering can't turn vehicle have to carry

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 522, Footscray Road, New Eltham, London

item.title: The area around the Constitution Arch in Hide Park Corner is completely in the dark, 9th September
item.description:
The area around and near the Constitution Arch in Hide Park Corner as well as in the cycle path that connect to Bucking Palace along Green Park, is completely in the dark both during the day and during the night. As a young woman, It's horrible to pass by there in the early evening and as well in the early morning and this must be fixed to ensure safety and control.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duke of Wellington Place, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
